column1: The '''Società Tolkieniana Italiana''' (Italian: "Italian Tolkien Society") was founded in [[1994]] as a non-profit
column2: non-political association. They publish two journals
column3: [[Terra di Mezzo]] (Middle-earth) and [[Minas Tirith (journal)|Minas Tirith]]. Their annual three day national convention is called "Hobbiton"
column4: and is usually held in the first week of September. The society organises meetings
column7: and art exhibitions around [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s works.
